aka: Alice nel Paese che si meraviglia

writer.name: 刘易斯·卡罗尔 Lewis Carroll

this_title: Alice and the Land That Wonders
trans_title: Alice nel Paese che si meraviglia
introduction: Alice is about to turn eighteen, but she doesn't seem to be ready to grow at all. A dive into the unconscious. A journey in search of a rebirth. A wish of hope to all the souls who choose life instead of suicide. A reasoning on the concept of normality, through the mirror of magical realism.
foreign_title: Alice and the Land That Wonders
